channel.title: Gopal's Blog Site
channel.description: Recent content on Gopal's Blog Site

item.title: Publish Static Site To Github
item.description: Introduction World has moved on to Jamstack They have you believe it’s so simple … but it never reall is. But you really want to publish it somewhere … not just your local desktop. … ToDo… … environemnt used for this blog … This guide is not a hugo tutorial. This is a guide for all the necessary steps that come after you have gone through a Hugo tutorial and decide it is time to publish something on Github-Pages.

item.title: Publishing Hugo Sites To Github Pages (From Windows)
item.description: Introduction World has moved on to Jamstack They have you believe it’s so simple … but it never reall is. But you really want to publish it somewhere … not just your local desktop. … ToDo… … environemnt used for this blog … This guide is not a hugo tutorial. This is a guide for all the necessary steps that come after you have gone through a Hugo tutorial and decide it is time to publish something on Github-Pages.
